title: Privacy and ventilation! Window coverings in every apartment
posting_body: ['Brookside Park Apartments', 'Visit Our Community Today!', '565 Saint Johns Ave Sw', 'Atlanta, GA 30315', 'show contact info', 'Work out in our newly revamped fitness center or simply relax by the pool.', 'You can also play a game of tennis at our tennis courts, or update your social media status in our business center.', 'We invite you to call us for more information or come by and see why our residents choose to call Brookside Park home!', 'We look forward to showing you around our community.', 'Bedrooms: 1 |  Bathrooms:  1', 'Square Footage: 830 sq ft', 'Rental Pricing: $1652/Month', 'Our Residents Enjoy:', '◾ Business Center', '◾ Clubhouse w/WIFI', '◾ Conference Room', '◾ Controlled Access Entry', '◾ Grill', '◾ Monthly Resident Events', '◾ Pet Care', '◾ Planned '<URL>/', 'Phone-Number:', 'show contact info', 'Pet-Policy: Brookside Park Apartments is a pet friendly community that welcome two pets per apartment home.', 'The pet fee is $300 non-refundable per pet.', 'There is a $15 monthly pet fee.', 'A pet addendum must be completed and pet fees must be paid prior to moving in.', 'If there is more than one pet per unit, the combined weight of the 2 pets cannot exceed 50 lbs.', 'Breed restrictions may apply.', 'Lease-Length: 6-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month', 'Take 75 South to Langford Parkway (Hwy 166 West) to 1st exit (Metropolitan Pkwy).', 'At light, take right.', 'Turn left at next light, which is Metropolitan Pkwy.', 'Turn right on St. Johns Ave.', 'Brookside Park is on the left.', 'Non-Refundable Admin Fee $135', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', '331DCF95D1CD4C']
